slides.title: Become a tree owner and help fight climate change!
slides.description: Plant trees, track their growth and get 100% of the profit from the sustainable timber, all while contributing to a greener future.

slides.title: Join our community cleanup events
slides.description: Take part in our monthly cleanup initiatives to keep our environment clean and reduce waste pollution.

slides.title: Plant a tree for the future
slides.description: Every tree planted contributes to carbon reduction. Start your own garden and make a difference for generations to come.
